name: followers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_v6.
Tool description: instagram api
API description: Retrieves the list of followers for a given Instagram user.

user_id.description: The ID of the Instagram user whose followers are to be retrieved.

batch_size.description: The number of followers to retrieve in one batch. Default is 20.

next_cursor.description: A cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of followers. Default is None.
